Package com.cececandicorner.inventory

Class InventoryManager

java.lang.Object
com.cececandicorner.inventory.InventoryManager
public class InventoryManager extends Object
InventoryManager.java Manages the inventory of Bracelet objects for Cece's Candi Corner. This class now interfaces with a DatabaseManager for persistent storage instead of an in-memory list or text files. It handles all core CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations, and generates reports by delegating to the DatabaseManager. It includes robust input validation to ensure data integrity.

      Constructor to initialize the InventoryManager with a DatabaseManager.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • getInventory

      public List<Bracelet> getInventory()
      Getter for the inventory list. This now fetches all bracelets from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of Bracelet objects from the database.

    • isIdUnique

      public boolean isIdUnique(String itemId)
      Checks if a given bracelet ID already exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      itemId - The ID to check for uniqueness.
      Returns:
      true if the ID is unique (does not exist in database), false otherwise.

    • getBraceletById

      public Bracelet getBraceletById(String itemId)
      Finds a bracelet by its ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      itemId - The ID of the bracelet to find.
      Returns:
      The Bracelet object if found, null otherwise.

    • addBracelet

      public String addBracelet(String id, String description, String quantityStr, String priceStr)
      Adds a new bracelet to the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID for the bracelet.
      description - A brief description or name of the bracelet.
      quantityStr - The current stock quantity of the bracelet.
      priceStr - The selling price of the bracelet.
      Returns:
      A string message indicating the outcome (success or error).

    • removeBracelet

      public String removeBracelet(String itemId)
      Removes a bracelet from the database based on its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      itemId - The ID of the bracelet to remove.
      Returns:
      A string message indicating the outcome (success or error).

    • updateBracelet

      public String updateBracelet(String itemId, String fieldToUpdate, String newValue)
      Updates a specific field of an existing bracelet in the database.
      Parameters:
      itemId - The ID of the bracelet to update.
      fieldToUpdate - The name of the field to update ("quantity", "price", or "status").
      newValue - The new value for the specified field.
      Returns:
      A string message indicating the outcome (success or error).

    • generateLowStockReport

      public List<Bracelet> generateLowStockReport(String thresholdStr)
      Generates a report listing all bracelets whose quantity falls below a user-specified threshold, fetching data from the database.
      Parameters:
      thresholdStr - The string representation of the threshold quantity.
      Returns:
      A list of Bracelet objects that are below the threshold, or an empty list if none. If the threshold input is invalid, returns null.
